title: UI styling compatibility
description: Outlines all of the classes and associated properties which can be styled.
content:
The following tables outline all of the classes and associated properties which can be styled. Additional support may be added over time, so please bookmark this page for reference.

UI objects

GuiObject

Class.GuiObject is an abstract class from which most UI classes inherit, including frames, labels, buttons, and more.


    Property
    Type



    Class.GuiObject.Active
    boolean


    Class.GuiObject.AnchorPoint
    Datatype.Vector2


    Class.GuiObject.AutomaticSize
    Enum.AutomaticSize


    Class.GuiObject.BackgroundColor
    Datatype.BrickColor

    Datatype.Color3


    Class.GuiObject.BackgroundTransparency
    float


    Class.GuiObject.BorderColor3
    Datatype.Color3
